titles.title: A joint resolution to call for the removal of the United States Armed Forces from the Persian Gulf.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. States the determination of the Congress that the requirements of the War Powers Resolution have become operative. Directs the President to remove U.S. armed forces from the Persian Gulf within 60 days unless the Congress declares war or extends such period.
